column5: I found this video to be very moving for some reason ...  http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=2539741   What does it do for you?    RFS
Video is not working at least for me
I've always loved that song. When I hear it...I think of my very best friend of 25 years...she truly has stood by me and I by her. Great video...thanks for sharing.
Still not working maybe because of my antivirus protection.   Whats the name of the song or video, maybe its on U-tube
bunch of different ppl/groups from different countries singing/playing stand by me   very cool
here ya go I hope this works...      RFS
Yea neat video, liking the Grandpa

For some who can't see the video, it is a bunch of bands, from everywhere on this earth, playing the same song in synch, maybe on a multi location live link.  Very cool.  The idea might have been served better by a multinational rendition of 'One Love, One Heart', but that is so cheezy,  and it would look like a Pepsi commercial. 'Stand by Me' is the better tune.   Hopeful is the message.  I like hopeful.  Lead or follow, or get out of the way.
Great tune. This is my favourite version of that song.
Excellent song and a great idea. World music on the internet. Whoever thought this up is on to something.
Randy, That is my all time fav of all. Brings tears for many reasons. Thanks from teary eyed grown man.
